introduction: Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) is a technology to implement automation projects. In many industries, PLC-based automation is sought-after technology. The students who are interested in making their career in automation must know ladder programming through this simulator students will be able to practice their own various instructions used in ladder programming.

experiments.name: Study hardware and software used in PLC

UG: Undergraduate students of Instrumentation and Control Engineering, Mechatronics Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering branches.
PG: Post-graduate students of Process Instrumentation, Mechatronics, Production Engineering.

objective: Identify the requirements of automation in a process plant</br></br>Develop various control schema using ladder programming.</br></br>Design complex ladders using advanced blocks</br></br>Troubleshoot the program implemented for a plant using a ladder diagram.
